title: 234. Do Boycotts Work?
description: The Montgomery Bus Boycott, the South African divestment campaign, Chick-fil-A! Almost anyone can launch a boycott, and the media loves to cover them. But do boycotts actually produce the change they're fighting for?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
